Articles.Content:
So Im going to post a few creations of mine. I really like SSTO and VTOL spaceplanes, and I like stylish crafts as well. The mods included in these are B9 Aerospace, KW Rocketry, Infernal Robotics, and Spaceplanes Plus

______________________________________________________________________

Peregrine 1 SSTO

The Peregrine is my fastest craft, capable of reaching 1500+ m/s prior to rocket ignition. Can attain an orbit of 200+ km

Peregrine 2 SSTO

The Peregrine 2 is a variant on the original Peregrine, trading speed for efficiency and low drag. When taking off, the wings set the center of lift ahead of the center of mass and make taking off very easy, once in the air the fold back to reduce drag and even out the center of lift and mass.

Eagle 1 SSTO

My personal favorite, the Eagle is a sizable and capable spaceplane.

Phaeton Jumpship

A very maneuverable and stable VTOL Craft inspired by the Destiny Beta jumpships.

The Skylon

Taking influence from its IRL counterpart, the Skylon is the most massive spaceplane I have ever built. Immensely heavy and cumbersome, it was a surprise to me that this SSTO cargo plane managed to lift off the ground, let alone achieve orbit.

______________________________________________________________________

Heres a link to my spaceplane album, if you want to see more pictures of these crafts and others, I will keep it updated! Thanks!

http://s911.photobucket.com/user/Lemmonade/slideshow/KSP

Edited August 1, 2014 by Lemmonade
Addition to post
What mod did you use for the skylon nosecone? I really like the space plane.

What mod did you use for the skylon nosecone? I really like the space plane.

Its meant to be an side attachment for additional liquid cores. its in the KW rocketry mod. Its not meant to be what I used it for, had to be creative

Not sure how you'd feel about necro-ing your spaceplane thread, but is there any chance of you posting some craft files? They look increadiable, and I'd love to see how you put them together.

Have a look see, I included a whole bunch of craft files in this .zip

Mods are used so heads up. Among those that are listed at the top theres MechJeb and possibly other small mods
